name: Pigeons Attack (itch)
description:
Pigeons Attack is a top-down shooter with combat elements whose goal is to survive to pigeons hordes and find the path to Kingdom of Pruuzharia, to defeat them for good. For this propose, you will count on upgrades and weapons around the level. Colect coins to unlock new characters and levels. Help to fight this invasion!

Survive!
Many pigeons addicted to popcorn are going to chase you down, each one with a particular behavior.

Attack!
Of course, we wouldn't leave you in the lurch. Shoot, explode and fight back with different weapons.

Explore!
Unlock other areas of the level and find new weapons and upgrades to help you in the combat.

Have fun!
Ok, the world is being dominated by pigeons, why not make fun of this situation?

HELP IMPROVING THE GAME

Criticisms and comments are welcome. Feel free to suggest improvements, changes or anything that came up while playing the game.

If you found any weird bug or problem, please use the comments below, send an email to support@nixtor.com.br, or leave a message on the Facebook page and please let me know.

If you are also a developer or a curious person, feel free to ask me how something was made, tools, assets used etc. I'll be glad to share what I have learnt so far. You can do this through the same links/email above or through my personal ones Facebook | Twitter

Thank you for playing and be careful, pigeons are watching us.
